TopicTitle: Warning: Null not supported by COLLADA.

Articles.Content:
I have been trying to make a wing in maya to use in ksp, but I keep getting this error

While reading or writing a file the following notifications have been raised.

Warning: Null not supported by COLLADA. Node group will lose its geometric information. The node transforms will be saved.

I can still use the model but it spawns far from the centre point. How do I stop this error?
No problem now. I found a way to fix it.

It\'s not an important error anyway - it\'s just a warning that there\'s information lost in the transition. So essentially: your model is the same, it\'s just the data that\'s behind it that\'s lost.
